text: o visvasulara! Allah nu, ayana sandesaharunni, ayana tana sandesaharunipai (muham'mad pai) avatarimpajesina granthanni mariyu ayana intaku purvam avatarimpajesina granthalannintini visvasincandi. Allah nu, ayana dutalanu, ayana grantalanu, ayana pravaktalanu, antima dinanni tiraskarincinavadu, vastavaniki margabhrastudai, margabhrastatvanlo cala duram poyinatle
